content: s/m l/1x 2x/3x finished bust about 40 48 56 in 101 5 122 142 cm finished length about 29 30 31 in 73 5 76 78 5 cm gauge 8 sts + 18 row = about 4 in 10 cm in garter st 8 sts + 14 row = about 4 in 10 cm in stockinette st 1 cardigan is worked sideways in one piece beg at one sleeve edge 2 a circular needle is used to accommodate the width of the fabric work back and forth in row on circular needle as if working with straight needles 3 cardigan is worked in garter st k every row and st st k on rs p on ws 4 the gauge difference between st st and garter st gives a slight a-line shape to the cardigan
